0: username=`grep -B 1 'username:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && password=`grep -B 1 'password:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && curl --fail $username:$password@localhost:3030/triggers/manual

username=`grep -B 1 'username:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && password=`grep -B 1 'password:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && curl --fail $username:$password@localhost:3030/triggers/manual

# Enable AOF https://redis.io/topics/persistence#append-only-file
appendonly yes
# Disable RDB persistence, AOF persistence already enabled.
save ""
maxmemory 188743680
maxmemory-policy allkeys-lru

[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
